snippet: The $20 million deal would allow the buyer, Sesac, to handle performing rights and “mechanical” rights, which cover the sale of CDs and downloads.
abstract: Songwriting rights group Sesac is buying Harry Fox Agency for $20 million.
lead_paragraph: The $20 million deal would allow the buyer, Sesac, to handle performing rights and “mechanical” rights, which cover the sale of CDs and downloads.

headline.main: Music Rights Group Is Buying Harry Fox Agency
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Sesac Confirms it Will Buy a Songwriting Rights Firm
